mapper.select:
select e.EVENT_ID eventId, e.EVENT_NBR eventNbr, e.EVENT_NAME eventName, e.EVENT_TRIG_TYPE eventTrigType, e.EVT_MAPPED_ADDR evtMappedAddr, t.EVT_TYPE_NAME evtTypeName, s.EVT_SRC_NAME evtSrcName from event e
where 1=1
